CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tasks in my area (a Tasks in Teams mobile feature)
CurrentVersion.description:
In the Tasks app and Microsoft Planner, which
helps power the Tasks app in Teams, buckets are a common way to organize tasks
into different areas of work. The mobile experience for the Tasks app in Teams
will soon be updated to make it easier to filter to a specific bucket or set of
buckets, so you can focus on tasks in your area. We expect this simple user
experience change to provide greater focus and greater productivity, while
maintaining the familiar look and feel throughout the Tasks app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tasks in my area (a Tasks in Teams mobile feature)
OldVersion.description:
In the Tasks app and Microsoft Planner, which
helps power the Tasks app in Teams, buckets are a common way to organize tasks
into different areas of work. The mobile experience for the Tasks app in Teams
will soon be updated to make it easier to filter to a specific bucket or set of
buckets, so you can focus on tasks in your area. We expect this simple user
experience change to provide greater focus and greater productivity, while
maintaining the familiar look and feel throughout the Tasks app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Deploy and manage Shifts for your frontline teams in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will gain the ability to standardize Shifts settings (open shifts, swap shifts requests, offer shifts requests, time off requests and time clock), identify schedule owners, and create scheduling groups uniformly for all frontline teams at the tenant level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Israel datacenter region and Advanced Data Residency availability
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 will launch a new local cloud region in Israel. The Advanced Data Residency add-on ("ADR") will be available in Israel and provide eligible customers with committed data residency in the Israel local cloud region, prioritized tenant migration services, and expanded coverage of Microsoft 365 workloads and Customer Data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Israel datacenter region and Advanced Data Residency availability
OldVersion.description: Microsoft 365 will launch a new local cloud region in Israel. The Advanced Data Residency add-on ("ADR") will be available in Israel and provide eligible customers with committed data residency in the Israel local cloud region, prioritized tenant migration services, and expanded coverage of Microsoft 365 workloads and Customer Data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
OldVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: MIP Label Support for Events
CurrentVersion.description:
,Tenants who have setup MIP sensitivity labels
for use on events will now have support in Outlook for Android to both read and
write labels to their meetings with enforcement of rules such as encryption as
defined by tenant admins.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: MIP Label Support for Events
OldVersion.description:
,Tenants who have setup MIP sensitivity labels
for use on events will now have support in Outlook for Android to both read and
write labels to their meetings with enforcement of rules such as encryption as
defined by tenant admins.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Teams work meetings from Microsoft Teams (free) and vice versa
CurrentVersion.description:
This
feature enables Microsoft Teams (free) users, those using a personal Microsoft
Account, to directly join Teams for work meetings from within the client and
stay connected even after the meeting has ended. This feature similarly also
enables Microsoft Teams (work or school) users to join the Microsoft Teams
(free) meetings directly from within the client.Â  These users are no longer prompted to join
via a browser and treated as meeting guests (anonymous).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a senderâs name or email address.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a senderâs name or email address.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Options Categorization
CurrentVersion.description:
We
are introducing grouping within Meeting Options to improve organizersâ and
co-organizersâ ease of understanding selections.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description:
Users can access the
Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their
sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when
needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
OldVersion.description:
Users can access the
Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their
sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when
needed.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Accessibility Updates to Tables
CurrentVersion.description: Accessibility improvements to tables within the text webpart allow users to specify row and column layouts, as well as provide alternative text labels for screen readers.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Accessibility Updates to Tables
OldVersion.description: Accessibility improvements to tables within the text webpart allow users to specify row and column layouts, as well as provide alternative text labels for screen readers.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low importance
CurrentVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for iOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Assign staff and set duration for on-demand Virtual Appointments (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Scheduling
administrators and staff managing on-demand appointments can assign specific
staff members and set appointment duration to handle on-demand services. This
ensures that when an on-demand appointment is requested, there is a designated
staff member assigned to the appointment and a defined duration for the
appointment is set. The designated staff member also receives a notification to
attend the on-demand appointment.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Assign staff and set duration for on-demand Virtual Appointments (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
Scheduling
administrators and staff managing on-demand appointments can assign specific
staff members and set appointment duration to handle on-demand services. This
ensures that when an on-demand appointment is requested, there is a designated
staff member assigned to the appointment and a defined duration for the
appointment is set. The designated staff member also receives a notification to
attend the on-demand appointment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio flyout and settings in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description:
The Audio and Video
Flyout is designed to make it easier and more efficient for users to manage
their audio and video settings during Teams meetings. Users can easily toggle
features on and off with visual indicators for both audio and video settings,
eliminating the need to navigate deep into the settings menu to make
adjustments.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
CurrentVersion.description:
This
feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute
and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control
your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic
icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Answer insights and enhanced user adoption analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Answer analytics for Microsoft Search provides insights into how editorial content like Bookmarks, Acronyms and Q&A are performing within the organization. Enhanced user analytics provides insights into search adoption across search applications like SharePoint, Microsoft Search for Bing, Microsoft Search for Windows, Microsoft365.com, and now also cover in-app searches from Outlook, Teams and other office applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) â Identify Teams as data sources (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Simplified picking of relevant Teams and channels (standard, private, and shared) to intelligently identify associated custodian mailboxes, group mailboxes, OneDrive for Business accounts, and SharePoint sites that may contain Teams data that's relevant to your case.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) â Identify Teams as data sources (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Simplified picking of relevant Teams and channels (standard, private, and shared) to intelligently identify associated custodian mailboxes, group mailboxes, OneDrive for Business accounts, and SharePoint sites that may contain Teams data that's relevant to your case.
